name: Biking full day Ho Chi Minh city(Sai Gon)
description: We start our trip with our local guide by riding to Chinatown with stops at Cholon and Binh Tay markets to see the locals bartering for wares. We also stop off at the Thien Hau temple .The Thien Hau temple was built in the early 19th Century dedicated to Thien Hau, the goddess of seafarers. We delve deeper into Chinatown visiting the amazing Cholon and Binh Tay Market for an insight into where locals shop. Stop at a local café for a coffee to watch the hectic pace of life pass by in Ho Chi Minh City.
